title: Process New Employee Access Request
description: A new operations manager has been hired. The security admin needs to set up their access credentials for the port's systems.

tasks.description: Receive the approved new hire form from HR.
tasks.expected_outcome: Admin has the new employee's name, title, and department.

tasks.description: Create a user account in the port's main system based on their job role template.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new user account is created with permissions appropriate for an operations manager.

tasks.description: Request the issuance of a physical port access ID card.
tasks.expected_outcome: A request is sent to the badging office to create a new ID card for the employee.
